name: Passing of Judgment
description:
3 Event Cards played by your opponent in this Round will take no effect.
(Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played per match. This card will be in your starting hand.)
descriptionraw: 3 Event Cards played by your opponent in this Round will take no effect.\n(Only one {SPRITE_PRESET#3007}"Arcane Legend" card can be played per match. This card will be in your starting hand.)
descriptionreplaced: 3 Event Cards played by your opponent in this Round will take no effect.\n(Only one {SPRITE_PRESET#3007}"Arcane Legend" card can be played per match. This card will be in your starting hand.)
storytext: "It is time to make the final decision on this case."
